TopicTitle: CurseForge not letting me pick KSP 1.7.3

Articles.Content:
This has been a problem before with CurseForge and I was wondering if them, or Squad, or Take 2, might have some idea how to get on top of this problem and keep it from happening again and again:

I just tried to update LaserDist to a new version, which I compiled for KSP 1.7.3.

CurseForge's interface when you upload a file refuses to let you type in your own free-form number for the KSP version - you must pick from the list.  But the list they give you is often out of date and wrong and prevents you from telling the truth.

Right now, the list they presented me doesn't go higher than KSP 1.7.1.  I compiled against KSP 1.7.3's DLL so I don't want to make the claim that it's for version 1.7.1 when it's not.  But I have to.  I am forced to "lie" by claiming it's for KSP 1.7.1 instead of 1.7.3 by the interface, or I cannot finish uploading the file.

This has happened before with patch releases not showing up in the list on CurseForge, several times, until weeks later.
